channel.title: [PI] - How do i make a dialogue appear when we first register - [PI]
channel.description:
Ok, I mean... I want to start a npc chat automatically right after I've registered. And i want it to say, "Hello, let's start of by you talking to me.". Problem is, i don't know how. I've tried Google btw.
Help plox. :P
